title: Sun Layer Configuration
description: Configuration for sun sprite, glow effects, and directional lighting

updateOrder.description: Layer update priority (lower numbers update first)

textureUrl.description: Path to sun sprite texture image

distanceFromEarth.description: Distance from Earth center in scene units

mainScale.description: Scale factor for main sun sprite

renderOrder.description: Render order for main sprite (higher renders on top)

baseRenderOrder.description: Base render order for glow layers (increments for each layer)

layers.description: Glow layers from outer to inner

scale.description: Scale factor for this glow layer (larger = outer glow)

color.description: Hex color for this glow layer (e.g., '#ffffff')

opacity.description: Opacity for this glow layer (0 = transparent, 1 = opaque)

lighting.description: Directional light settings for scene illumination

material.description: THREE.js material settings for sun sprites

blending.description: Blending mode for sprites. AdditiveBlending creates glow effect

depthWrite.description: Whether to write to depth buffer (false for transparent objects)

depthTest.description: Whether to test depth (true = hidden behind other objects)
